column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Okay , we 've put in a lot of distance between us and them .
#Text=" Aang says : " All right , all right , everyone 's exhausted !
#Text=" Toph says : " No , I want to hear what Katara has to say .
#Text=Maybe if you helped out earlier , we could have set up our camp faster and gotten some sleep and then maybe we would n't be in this situation !
